com.github.jnstockley.addressbookcli

Class AddressHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jnstockley.addressbookcli.AddressHelper

  • public class AddressHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This part of the program helps connect the user to the MySQL database and address table by formating data and allowing user input
    Version:
    3.1
    Author:
    jnstockley
